# The effect of rnai treatment on longevity 

Hypothesis: 
I hypothesise that the raga-1 gene being the dsDNA target gene will therefore have a direct effect on decreasing how many offspring a c.celegans will have as well as decreasing longevity both in themselves and in their offspring.
